page.title: 12LEISURE CENTRES,NEWPORT.
page.content: There are several leisure centres in Newport. The most recent being the Newport Centre. It has a large swimming pool which contains a large water slide and a wave machine. The centre has a large concert hall which holds 2000 people. The centre has many squash courts, some are glass backed. There are sauna's,a health suite and weight training equipment.A main hall is used as badmington courts. The centre also has a bar and restaurant overlooking the pool. The Lliswerry leisure centre has a small swimming pool, a large sports hall and outside pitches, such as an all weather pitch which can be floodlit during the evening. At Spytty Park there is a small complex consisting of squash courts and 4 outdoor tennis courts.
